content: संस्थापनं {@--1@} Placing or keeping together, collecting. {@--2@} Fixing, determining, regulating; कुर्वीत चैषां प्रत्य क्षमर्घसंस्थापनं नृपः <ls>Ms. 8. 402.</ls> {@--3@} Establishment, confirmation; धर्मसंस्थापनार्थाय संभवामि गे युगे <ls>Bg. 4. 8.</ls> {@--4@} Restraining, curbing. {@--5@} A statute, regulation. --ना {@--1@} Restraining, curbing. {@--2@} A means of calming or composing; संस्थापना प्रियतरा विरहातुराणां <ls>Mk. 3. 3.</ls>
